name: RolandLunaSupport
_source: speak;Luna;Hey, Meathead. Give me your arm.
speak;Roland;What? Oh, heya, Luna. What are you-{no_wait}
speak;Luna;You didn't even notice it got bit by that Revenant. Leaving that untreated can get bad fast.
speak;Roland;Oh, thanks! You're pretty handy to have around, you know.
speak;Luna;I tend to be. As long as I have big oafs like you around to take the attacks for me, my job is pretty easy.
speak;Roland;That's right! Guess we make a pretty good team, huh?
speak;Roland;Anyway, let's keep going! These monsters aren't gonna kill themselves.
